Hi, 

> You're writing a book on Yoritomo and yet you're asking people whose
> veracity and limit of knowledge is untestable to tell you about him? 

I do agree with Tony, but if you think it's OK with you, here's some search
result for you, Andrea.
http://www.google.co.jp/search?sourceid=navclient&hl=ja&q=%8C%B9%97%8A%92%A9
Note:these results are in Japanese. Some pages may have english version.

Following is just for record:

> The Muromachi shogunate was the product of Hojo engineering, 

Muromachi shogunate was by Ashikaga Takauji, 1338.
(I found no english page with picture)

Minamoto Yoritomo started Kamakura shogunate in 1192.
http://www.kyohaku.go.jp/meihin/kaiga/shozo/mht5903e.htm
(Portrait of Minamoto Yoritomo)
......Anyway, Hojo took control over Kamakura Shogunate later.
